answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Sometimes stasis of food in the intestinal tract can pave the way for accumulation of gas, bloating and undigested food. It can be due to diabetes. Diabetes can cause autonomic neuropathy and affect the digestive system, leading to problems with digestion and elimination.  Besides good glycemic control, medications such as cisapride a prokinetic agent are given to promote emptying. Begin with good lifestyle measures to control your symptoms. Exercise regularly. Take frequent small meals. Avoid those foods which are high in oil content. Eliminate alcohol, stop smoking and avoid caffeinated beverages and spicy food.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
